Skill.name: Cloth Armor Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the player to equip cloth armors. Adds bonus to movement speed when wearing cloth armor.

Skill.name: Light Armor Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the player to equip light armors. Adds bonus to health when wearing light armor.

Skill.name: Plate Armor Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the player to equip plate armors. Adds bonus to defense when wearing light armor.

Skill.name: Weapon Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the player to equip higher level weapons. Adds bonus to damage when a weapon is equipped.

Skill.name: Impact
Skill.description: Deals {X}% of damage to a target.

Skill.name: Shockwave
Skill.description: Deals {X}% of damage around the player.

Skill.name: Gathering Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the gathering of high tier herbs. Decreases gathering time.

Skill.name: Mining Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the mining of high tier ores. Decreases mining time.

Skill.name: Summon Pet
Skill.description: Allows the summoning of pets. Limits to 1 summoned pet at a time.

Skill.name: Taming
Skill.description: Allows the taming of a tamable monster. Chance of success if {X}%.

Skill.name: Shield Mastery
Skill.description: Allows equipping a higher level shield. Increases defense when wearing a shield.

Skill.name: Dual-Wield Mastery
Skill.description: Allows the dual-wielding of 1-hand weapons. The secondary weapon uses {X}% of it's stats.
